member.name: T:Nancy.EmbeddedContent.Conventions.StaticContentsConventionsExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods to aid adding embedded static content into conventions

member.name: M:Nancy.EmbeddedContent.Conventions.StaticContentsConventionsExtensions.AddEmbeddedDirectory(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Func{Nancy.NancyContext,System.String,Nancy.Response}},System.String,System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Adds a directory-based convention for embedded static resources
member.param: Conventions in which static content will be added
The path that should be matched with the request
The path to where the content is stored in your application, relative to the root. If this is then it will be the same as .
A list of extensions that is valid for the conventions. If not supplied, all extensions are valid.

The assembly that contains the embedded static content
The path to where the content is stored in your application, relative to the root. If this is then it will be the same as .
A list of extensions that is valid for the conventions. If not supplied, all extensions are valid.

member.summary: Adds a directory-based convention for embedded static convention
member.param: The path that should be matched with the request
The assembly that contains the embedded static content
The path to where the content is stored in your application, relative to the root. If this is then it will be the same as .
A list of extensions that is valid for the conventions. If not supplied, all extensions are valid.
member.returns: A instance for the requested embedded static contents if it was found, otherwise .

member.summary: Contains the functionality for locating a view that has been embedded into an assembly resource.

member.summary: A list of assemblies to ignore when scanning for embedded views.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: An instance that should be used when extracting embedded views.
An instance that should be used to determine which assemblies to scan for embedded views.

member.name: M:Nancy.EmbeddedContent.EmbeddedViewLocationProvider.GetLocatedViews(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Returns an instance for all the views that could be located by the provider.
member.param: An instance, containing the view engine file extensions that is supported by the running instance of Nancy.
member.returns: An instance, containing instances for the located views.
member.remarks: If no views could be located, this method should return an empty enumerable, never .

member.name: M:Nancy.EmbeddedContent.EmbeddedViewLocationProvider.GetLocatedViews(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns an instance for all the views matching the viewName that could be located by the provider.
member.param: An instance, containing the view engine file extensions that is supported by the running instance of Nancy.
The location of the view to try and find
The name of the view to try and find
member.returns: An instance, containing instances for the located views.
member.remarks: If no views could be located, this method should return an empty enumerable, never .
